trans-unit.source: Provides a set of static methods, attached properties, and events for determining and setting focus scopes and for setting the focused element within the scope.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um conjunto de métodos estáticos, propriedades anexadas e eventos para determinar e definir escopos foco e para definir o elemento focalizado dentro do escopo.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] there are two concepts concerning focus: keyboard focus and logical focus.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] há dois conceitos relacionados com foco: foco do teclado e foco lógico.

trans-unit.source: Keyboard focus pertains to the element which is currently receiving keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: O foco do teclado referem-se ao elemento que está recebendo entrada do teclado.

trans-unit.source: There can be only one element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Pode haver apenas um elemento com o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: This element with keyboard focus has <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este elemento com o foco do teclado tem <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> returns the element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Retorna o elemento com o foco do teclado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Logical focus pertains to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within a specific focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Foco lógico se refere ao <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>dentro de um escopo específico de foco.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Um escopo de foco é um elemento de contêiner que controla o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>dentro de seu escopo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Window>classe é um escopo de foco são o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>classes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento que é um escopo de foco tem <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: There can be multiple elements with logical focus, but there can only be one element with logical focus within a single focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Pode haver vários elementos com foco lógico, mas só pode haver um elemento com o foco lógico em um escopo de foco único.

trans-unit.source: An element with logical focus does not necessarily have keyboard focus, but an element with keyboard focus will have logical focus.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento com foco lógico não necessariamente tem o foco do teclado, mas um elemento com o foco do teclado terá foco lógico.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to define a focus scope within a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: É possível definir um escopo de foco em um escopo de foco.

trans-unit.source: In this case, both the parent focus scope and the child focus scope can have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o escopo de foco pai e o escopo de foco filho podem ter um <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following scenario illustrates how keyboard focus and logical focus change in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application that has a <xref:System.Windows.Window> with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> which has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: O cenário a seguir ilustra como o foco do teclado e foco lógico alterados em uma [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] aplicativo que tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Window>com um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>e um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>que tem um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: When keyboard focus changes from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> losses keyboard focus but retains logical focus for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Quando o foco do teclado muda do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>o foco do teclado perdas mas retém foco lógico para o <xref:System.Windows.Window>focar escopo.</xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> obtains keyboard focus and obtains logical focus for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>obtém o foco do teclado e obtém foco lógico para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>focar escopo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: When keyboard focus returns to the root <xref:System.Windows.Window>, the element in <xref:System.Windows.Window> focus scope with logical focus will obtain keyboard focus, which in this case is the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o foco do teclado retorna para a raiz <xref:System.Windows.Window>o elemento no <xref:System.Windows.Window>escopo de foco com foco lógico obterá o foco do teclado, que nesse caso é <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> now has keyboard focus and logical focus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>agora tem o foco do teclado e foco lógico.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> loses keyboard focus, but retains logical focus for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>perde o foco do teclado, mas manterá foco lógico para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>focar escopo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão de <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>em um <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and the [Focus Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o foco, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [visão geral de foco](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um manipulador para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>evento anexado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> que escuta para esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be added.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um manipulador para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>evento anexado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> que escuta para esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be added.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*>propriedade anexada.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element with logical focus within the specified focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento com foco lógico dentro do escopo do foco especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> is the element which has logical focus for a specific focus scope.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>é o elemento que tem foco lógico para um escopo específico de foco.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: This object may or may not have keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto pode ou não pode ter o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: Keyboard focus refers to the element that receives keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: O foco do teclado refere-se ao elemento que recebe entrada do teclado.

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o foco, o foco do teclado e foco lógico, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If `element` is not a focus scope, this method will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se `element` não é um escopo de foco, esse método retornará `null`.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A>, to specify the element with logical focus within a specified focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A>, para especificar o elemento com foco lógico em um escopo de foco especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element with logical focus in the specified focus scope.
trans-unit.target: O elemento com o foco lógico no escopo de foco especificado.

trans-unit.source: The element in the specified focus scope with logical focus.
trans-unit.target: O elemento no escopo do foco especificado com foco lógico.

trans-unit.source: element is .
trans-unit.target: elementis .

trans-unit.source: Determines the closest ancestor of the specified element that has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*> set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina o ancestral mais próximo do elemento especificado tem <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão de <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>em um <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Um escopo de foco é um elemento de contêiner que controla o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>dentro de seu escopo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Window>classe é um escopo de foco são o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>classes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento que é um escopo de foco tem <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o foco, o foco do teclado e foco lógico, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The element to get the closest focus scope for.
trans-unit.target: O elemento para obter o escopo mais próximo foco.

trans-unit.source: The focus scope for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: O escopo de foco para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: element is .
trans-unit.target: elementis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> is a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o especificado <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref> é um escopo de foco.

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Um escopo de foco é um elemento de contêiner que controla o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>dentro de seu escopo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Window>classe é um escopo de foco são o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>classes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.target: Um elemento que é um escopo de foco tem <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o foco, o foco do teclado e foco lógico, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The element from which to read the attached property.
trans-unit.target: O elemento do qual ler a propriedade anexada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> on the specified element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>for definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> no elemento especificado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>evento anexado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>propriedade anexada.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão de <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>em um <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Um escopo de foco é um elemento de contêiner que controla o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>dentro de seu escopo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Window>classe é um escopo de foco são o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>classes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento que é um escopo de foco tem <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o foco, o foco do teclado e foco lógico, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>evento anexado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Removes a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Remove um manipulador para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>evento anexado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> que escuta para esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be removed.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Remove um manipulador para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>evento anexado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> que escuta para esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be removed.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Sets logical focus on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Determina o foco lógico no elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> is the element which has logical focus for the specific focus scope.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>é o elemento que tem foco lógico para o escopo de foco específico.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: This object may or may not have keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto pode ou não pode ter o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: Keyboard focus refers to the element that receives keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: O foco do teclado refere-se ao elemento que recebe entrada do teclado.

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o foco, o foco do teclado e foco lógico, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: It is possible to specify a focus scope that is an ancestor of the focus scope the element is in.
trans-unit.target: É possível especificar um escopo de foco que é um ancestral do escopo de foco, que o elemento.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is a focus scope and its parent <xref:System.Windows.Window> is a focus scope, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> child of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> could specify the <xref:System.Windows.Window> as the focus scope when calling SetFocusedElement.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>é um escopo de foco e seu pai <xref:System.Windows.Window>é um escopo de foco, um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>filho a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>poderia especificar o <xref:System.Windows.Window>como o escopo de foco ao chamar SetFocusedElement.</xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is then <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> for both the <xref:System.Windows.Window> focus scope and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>é, em seguida, <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>para ambos o <xref:System.Windows.Window>focar o escopo e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>focar escopo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: SetFocusedElement will give the specified element logical focus in the specified focus scope and will attempt to give the element keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: SetFocusedElement dará o foco lógico do elemento especificado no escopo de foco especificado e tenta dar o foco do teclado de elemento.

trans-unit.source: The focus scope in which to make the specified element the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*>.
trans-unit.target: O escopo de foco em que deseja que o elemento especificado <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*>

trans-unit.source: The element to give logical focus to.
trans-unit.target: O elemento a ser colocado em foco lógico.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> as a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Define especificado <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref> como um escopo de foco.

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Um escopo de foco é um elemento de contêiner que controla o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>dentro de seu escopo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Window>classe é um escopo de foco são o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>classes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento que é um escopo de foco tem <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o foco, o foco do teclado e foco lógico, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The element to make a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: O elemento para tornar um escopo de foco.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if `element` is a focus scope; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se `element` é um escopo de foco; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
